2024

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Montserrat|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#303030″ text_font_size=”60px” text_line_height=”1.1em” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||40px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”||20px||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”||10px||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”32px” text_font_size_phone=”26px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”” text_orientation_phone=”left” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

A Customs
Brokerage

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”GothamBook||||||||” text_text_color=”#303030″ text_font_size=”15px” text_line_height=”1.8em” width=”80%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”||20px||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”||10px||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

ACB was founded by Juan Jose Rodriguez in 1978 and is now in the caring and capable hands of his sons Gabriel and Fernando Rodriguez who serve as President and Vice President respectively. They continue the vision of their father to make ACB more than just a company with employees but a family which they rely on to be an extension of themselves.

Personalized attention, white-glove service, and accountability allows us to form lasting bonds and become true partners with our customers. We have long recognized that the better we do our job, the better you can do yours.

A Customs Brokerage is a family owned and operated logistics company that has been in business for more than 40 years. We are a team of professionals that provide a concierge service. At ACB our promise is to take your business to the next level utilizing our network of partners and expertise gained over years of providing quality work.

CHB Manager

[/et_pb_cta][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”17px||20px|||” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”21px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://acb-us.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/Federal_Maritime_Commission_seal-svg.png” title_text=”Federal_Maritime_Commission_seal-svg” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” width=”200px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”GothamBook||||||||” text_text_color=”#303030″ text_font_size=”15px” text_line_height=”1.8em” width=”80%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|tablet” min_height=”147px” custom_margin=”25px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”||20px||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”||10px||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

ACB president, Gabriel Rodriguez, is proud to serve on the National Shipper Advisory Committee of the Federal Maritime Commission (FMC). Through this role, Gabriel advises the commission on policies relating to the competitiveness, reliability, integrity, and fairness of the international ocean freight delivery system.

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”48px||7px|||” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”-33px|auto||auto||” custom_padding=”||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Montserrat|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#303030″ text_font_size=”40px” text_line_height=”1.3em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||25px||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”32px” text_font_size_phone=”26px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]
